title: The Art of the child
creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
brief_description: An exposition of child art as practised at home and at school by children of all ages. This film includes a visit to the National Exhibition of children’s art to see the variety of exciting works by young people.
creator_credit_for_label: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
